title: Coronavirus: CDC recommends temporarily separating newborns from mothers with Covid-19
description: CDC says guidelines are 'intentionally cautious' until more information about virus becomes available
content:
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) has said new mothers who have tested positive for coronavirus should be temporarily separated from their newborns.
